Detailed Description

An XML document, basically an array of XMLNode.

An sxmlc XML document can have several root nodes. It actually usually have a prolog <?xml version="1.0" ...?> as the first node, then maybe a few comment nodes, then the first root node, which is the last node in correctly-formed XML, but there can also be some other nodes after it.
